properties.Description: The tenant action groups properties of the resource.

groupShortName.Description: The short name of the action group. This will be used in SMS messages.

enabled.Description: Indicates whether this tenant action group is enabled. If a tenant action group is not enabled, then none of its receivers will receive communications.

emailReceivers.Description: The list of email receivers that are part of this tenant action group.

smsReceivers.Description: The list of SMS receivers that are part of this tenant action group.

webhookReceivers.Description: The list of webhook receivers that are part of this tenant action group.

azureAppPushReceivers.Description: The list of AzureAppPush receivers that are part of this tenant action group.

voiceReceivers.Description: The list of voice receivers that are part of this tenant action group.

name.Description: The name of the email receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within a tenant action group.

emailAddress.Description: The email address of this receiver.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

status.Description: The receiver status of the e-mail.

name.Description: The name of the SMS receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within a tenant action group.

countryCode.Description: The country code of the SMS receiver.

phoneNumber.Description: The phone number of the SMS receiver.

name.Description: The name of the webhook receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within a tenant action group.

serviceUri.Description: The URI where webhooks should be sent.

useCommonAlertSchema.Description: Indicates whether to use common alert schema.

useAadAuth.Description: Indicates whether or not use AAD authentication.

objectId.Description: Indicates the webhook app object Id for aad auth.

identifierUri.Description: Indicates the identifier uri for aad auth.

tenantId.Description: Indicates the tenant id for aad auth.

name.Description: The name of the Azure mobile app push receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within a tenant action group.

emailAddress.Description: The email address registered for the Azure mobile app.

name.Description: The name of the voice receiver. Names must be unique across all receivers within a tenant action group.

countryCode.Description: The country code of the voice receiver.

phoneNumber.Description: The phone number of the voice receiver.
